<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>true</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_rest_message_fn</collection> <condition>gs.getProperty('com.glide.business_rule.outbound_rest', false)</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>REST Method: Check Variables</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[gs.include('RESTVariableBusinessRuleChecker'); var checker = new RESTVariableBusinessRuleChecker(); var grRestMessage = new GlideRecord('sys_rest_message'); grRestMessage.get(current.rest_message); grRestMessage.next();
checker.check(grRestMessage, current.function_name); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>dave.edquilang</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-11-20 19:51:07</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0a14a3165333020048ae0f0c36dc3479</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>REST Method: Check Variables</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Web Service Consumer" source="com.glide.web_service_consumer">9253f8a03c31311068bcf327dfe37f67</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0a14a3165333020048ae0f0c36dc3479</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>dave.edquilang</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-11-25 00:15:20</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0a14a3165333020048ae0f0c36dc3479"/> </record_update>
